Articles.Content: Every time I go to the launch pad or runway the view goes to orbital, sometimes I can change the view (v) most of the time not. I have no keyboard control most of the time, the other times it won't load and I have to shut it down. The VAB won't recognize any command module I put on it. Every time I go to launch I get the message vehicle will be uncontrollable or something like that. I understand it's still early release but just a couple of days ago I could play and enjoy it, not so much now.

Have you tried turning it off and on again?

Usually a game restart, or at most a campaign restart, fixes these issues for me. It stinks because longstanding missions are a bust, but vehicle testing and one-off missions are still a go this way.

Remember that Early Access is the same as putting the game difficulty on "Insane" mode, which is generally enjoyable for a small subset of players, and even then only in managed doses.

LOL. I agree about the early access. I've tried all the above and then some. Unfortunately, the only thing I've found that works is deleting my campaigns. I've had to do this before. On the upside I can now build a rocket to Duna in under five minutes. Thanks for the response.
